  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize(AllTreatmentController controller, javafx.stage.Stage stage, Patient patient)
      Initializes the NewTreatmentController with the given AllTreatmentController, Stage, and Patient. It sets up the necessary listeners for the input fields and disables the 'Add' button until valid input is provided. It also sets up a converter for the DatePicker to handle LocalDate objects.
      Parameter:
      controller - The AllTreatmentController that this NewTreatmentController is associated with.
      stage - The Stage that this NewTreatmentController is displayed on.
      patient - The Patient that this NewTreatmentController is creating a treatment for.
